page.title: 17"The Pheasant" Page 2
page.content: The Inn is open from{1100 to 1430}and {18 30 to 23 00}weekdays and{ 12 00 to {14 00 and 19 00 to 22 30}on Sunday. It sells a wide range of drinks{ including{'traditional'}beer.One type of such beer is made by{'Warwick {Brewers'}run by men who were previously a{chemist}and an{engineer}. The busiest time of the week is {Saturday}and the busiest time of the year is{Summer.}Customers come from a wide area,{Coventry,Leicester,Nuneaton and{Hinckley. There are some regulars from Withybrook including{old age {pensioners}who find it cheaper to buy meals at the inn than to cook their own.Two nights a week, Fridays and Sundays the locals gather in a corner of the lounge.The two local football teams also meet in the Inn.
